personal.name: Rafiluis De Los Santos
personal.description: I build digital experiences for the web and mobile devices

description: Worked with seveal clients across multiple industries and l`ed a green-field concept for a cross-platform mobile app using React Native, Android core functionality, and Zendesk, collaborating closely with UI/UX designers and stakeholders to optimize user experience and prepare for potential client deployment on the Google Play Store.

Mentored future software engineers in JavaScript, emphasizing language intricacies, coding best practices, and style principles, while offering personalized one-on-one guidance to nurture their career development along with other internal initiatives.
Collaborated with other engineers in developing modular admissions software for higher education using Angular, MongoDB, and Node.js

Delivered a seamless 100% remote film festival experience by designing dynamic schedules, integrating WordPress headless CMS via GraphQL and REST APIs for e-commerce, and enhancing overall UX with React, Gatsby.js, SCSS, and Elevent's APIs.

projects.name: OpenCounter
description: openCounter is a full-stack web application inspired by OpenTable using Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, ReactJS, ReduxJS, CSS3, and HTML5.

projects.name: BitMaximo
description: Bit Maximo! is a dexterity-based infinite runner that tests hand-eye coordination using JavaScript, Webpack, Canvas API, HTML5, and CSS3.
